name: Zeeverse
storyline:
In Zeeverse you explore various dungeons, hunt for treasures, battle epic bosses with friends, battle other players, build and farm on your lands, discover treasures, and travel Zeeverse to discover epic adventures.
Zeeverse aim to be a casual and social experience. Turn-based strategy gameplay combined with a strong social layer offers the depth of gameplay and advanced meta-game systems.
Social systems like chat, friend lists, trading, and custom party creation will allow playing together with friends, meeting new people, and building great friendships. Players will be able to use social islands where they can just relax, chat and prepare for battles in real-time.
The gameplay of Zeeverse allows players to play the game in a variety of different modes - Dungeons. There are beginner-friendly game modes where players can play with only one Zee and game modes where players can use up to 5 ZEE.
While the player can play solo there are also dungeons that will require players to team up in a party of 3 in order to play. These kinds of dungeons require coordination and great communication skills between players.
Each ZEE has unique abilities, a specific class that gives certain advantages and disadvantages, and special attributes which give specific ZEE its strengths and weaknesses. It's up to the player to form a team that balances out these factors and uses his skill in the battle to execute his strategy!
Strategy invested work and player's skill are everything!
summary: Zeeverse is a creator platform built on top of a blockchain-based game centered around a vast collection of unique little creatures called ZEE NFTs. Collect and battle more than 250+ different ZEE kinds with unlimited variations. Each unique, each only yours. In Zeeverse you explore various dungeons, hunt for treasures, battle epic bosses with friends, battle other players, build and farm on your lands, discover treasures, and travel Zeeverse to discover epic adventures.
